needs: Rahma seeks to continuously improve laboratory diagnostics and operational efficiency by introducing measurable process enhancements that reduce turnaround times and costs while maintaining high accuracy and governance standards. They focus on clarifying outcomes and constraints early, using data-driven probes to guide incremental improvements and align cross-functional teams effectively within a part-time role.
personality: Rahma is a pragmatic, data-driven collaborator who values transparency, simplicity, and accountability. They communicate directly with clear documentation and measurable goals, surfacing unknowns early to reduce risk. They prioritize humane, readable processes and inclusive practices, promoting velocity and reliability while mentoring peers through concise narratives and shared decision logs.
